basics.label: Manager - Information Technology and Building Automation Systems
basics.summary: Versatile Building Automation System engineer and IT professional with vast knowledge of Enterprise Project Lifecycle methodology and experience to deliver insightful network infrastructure and building automation solutions.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Manager - Information Technology and Building Automation Systems
work.summary: Led a cross-functional team of engineers, QAs and UX designers to develop features and fix product defects. Delivered detailed feature roadmaps that included action items and project targets.
highlights: Awarded the Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal in 2010, 2011, 2012, and 2013
Awarded Sailor of the Year designation for the Pacific Naval Fleet in 2013
Successfully managed the network infrastructure and server environment for 150+ users and 300+ PC and network systems
Responsible for the training and development of 8 technicians and project coordinators within my team

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Utilized IT expertise to support communications efforts in Operation Iraqi Freedom and Operation New Dawn, focusing on network security, Microsoft-based programs, and the installation and maintenance of affiliated hardware.
